data.text: @backtoxcx It's just that Americans don't like to buy songs that much. Maybe you'd rather listen to music on Spotify，but they'd rather buy it. Cultural differences.

@backtoxcx They are fans from all over the world . Actually, It doesn't need to sell a lot of albums or songs to get on the us charts. In Asian countries, superstars like Kris can sell millions or even tens of millions of albums or songs in their country.
